With Office 2016, editing documents in Word editing software (text), PowerPoint (presentation) and OneNote (Quick Notes) shall be made to a number of hands that can work simultaneously. This feature works in the version for desktops.
 
Word
It can view other editors typing while working. Despite being new to Office package, the real-time collaboration is already present in competing services like Google Docs, online document editing service Google.Ãƒâ€š simultaneous editing of Office is integrated with Microsoft's storage service, onedrive .

Outlook
E-mail is also redesigned. A search engine makes a search for items in the fastest case. The option to save attachments "in the cloud" makes the lightest e-mail service.
